scripts.build: bun build src/background.ts --outdir=dist && bun build src/content-script.ts --outdir=dist && bun build src/popup.ts --outdir=dist && bun build src/options.ts --outdir=dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/*.html dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.dev: bun run build && bun run dev:watch
scripts.dev:watch: bun build src/background.ts src/content-script.ts src/popup.ts src/options.ts --outdir=dist --watch
